Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.managers

Class PowerBlockManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.api.restartable.Restartable
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.managers.PowerBlockManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRestartable
@Singleton public final class PowerBlockManager extends Restartable
Manages all power block interactions.
Author:
Pim

  • Constructor Details

    • PowerBlockManager

      @Inject public PowerBlockManager(RestartableHolder restartableHolder, IConfigLoader config, DatabaseManager databaseManager)
      Initializes the PowerBlockManager. If it has already been initialized, it'll return that instance instead.
      Parameters:
      restartableHolder - The RestartableHolder that manages this object.
      config - The configuration of this plugin.
      databaseManager - The database manager to use for power block retrieval.

  • Method Details

    • unloadWorld

      public void unloadWorld(String worldName)
      Unloads a world from the cache.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world to unload.

    • loadWorld

      public void loadWorld(String worldName)
      Loads a world.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world.

    • doorsFromPowerBlockLoc

      public CompletableFuture<List<CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractDoor>>>> doorsFromPowerBlockLoc(Vector3Di loc, String worldName)
      Gets all DoorBases that have a powerblock at a location in a world.
      Parameters:
      loc - The location.
      worldName - The name of the world.
      Returns:
      All DoorBases that have a powerblock at a location in a world.

    • isBigDoorsWorld

      public boolean isBigDoorsWorld(String worldName)
      Checks if a world is a BigDoors world. In other words, it checks if a world contains more than 0 doors.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world.
      Returns:
      True if the world contains at least 1 door.

    • updatePowerBlockLoc

      public void updatePowerBlockLoc(AbstractDoor door, Vector3Di oldPos, Vector3Di newPos)
      Updates the position of the power block of a DoorBase in the database.
      Parameters:
      door - The DoorBase.
      oldPos - The old position.
      newPos - The new position.

    • onDoorAddOrRemove

      public void onDoorAddOrRemove(String worldName, Vector3Di pos)
      Invalidates the cache for when a door is either added to a world or removed from it.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world of the door.
      pos - The position of the door's power block.

    • invalidateChunk

      public void invalidateChunk(String worldName, Vector2Di chunk)
      Invalidates the cache of a chunk in a world.
      Parameters:
      worldName - The name of the world.
      chunk - The location (x,z) of the chunk in chunk-space.

    • shutDown

      public void shutDown()
      Description copied from interface: IRestartable
